recipe.title: Almond biscotti - sara vizzari
recipe.ingredients: 3 eggs 1/2 cup veg. oil 1 cup sugar 2 tsp almond extract 1/2 cup chopped almonds 2 1/2 cup all purpose flour 2 tsp baking powder 1 tsp. cardemom or nutmeg
recipe.directions: Beat eggs add oil and sugar and almond extract Beat for 5 min. Add flour and baking powder cardimom Form dough into logs about 1/2 in. thick 1 1/2 in.wide and 12 in.long spacing at least 2in. apart - bake for 25 min on 325F on a greased and floured cookie sheet. Transfer from baking sheet to rack. Let cool for 5 min. Place on a cutting board ,then take out cut into 1/2 in strips put on cookie sheet and bake for 10-15 min or until golden brown turning over once

recipe.title: Banana Bread
recipe.ingredients:
1/4 cup butter 1/2 cup brown sugar 3 ripe bananas 1/2 teaspoon vanilla 1 1/4 cups all- purpose flour 2 teaspoons baking powder 1/2 teaspoon baking soda 1/2 teaspoon salt
Handful of dried cranberries, walnuts or pecans
recipe.directions: Preheat oven to 325F. Heavily grease and flour one 9x5 loaf pan Sift together flour.baking powder, baking soda and salt. Set aside In a large bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add vanilla Mash the bananas in a seperate bowl and add to the creamed butter and sugar mixture. Add the sifted flour mixture to the butter mixture. Mix until just blended. Pour mixture into prepared pan and smooth top. Bake at 325F for 35 to 45 min. ot until browned and a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool on rack for 15 min. before turning out of pans.

recipe.title: Basil Pesto sauce
recipe.ingredients: 2 cups fresh basil leaves, packed 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese 1/2 cup Olive oil 3 tablespoons pine nuts or walnuts 3 garlic cloves, finely minced
recipe.directions: Place basil leaves in small batches in food processor and whip until well chopped (do about 3/4 cup at a time). Add about 1/3 the nuts and garlic, blend again. Add about 1/3 of the Parmesan cheese; blend while slowly adding about 1/3 of the olive oil, stopping to scrape down sides of container. Process basil pesto it forms a thick smooth paste. Repeat until all ingredients are used, mix all batches together well. Serve over pasta. Basil pesto keeps in refrigerator one week, or freeze for a few months.

recipe.title: Bean Dip
recipe.ingredients: 1 red pepper 1 yellow pepper 1 green pepper 1 red onion 1 can of kidney beans 1 can of black beans catalina dressing shredded cheddar cheese
recipe.directions: Chop onions small. Chop peppers into small squares Add beans Add dressing until coated nicely. Top with shredded cheddar cheese just before serving

recipe.title: Bean Salad
recipe.ingredients:
1 can of each: green beans, yellow beans, kidney beans, lima beans - all drained 1 small green pepper, cut in thin strips or pieces 1 small onion cut thin (leave in circles, or dice) Put the above in a large bowl.
Mix together: 1/3 c. salad oil (I use vegetable, or canola) 2/3 c. white vinegar 3/4 c. white sugar 1 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper Add to first mixture and marinate for a few hours.
recipe.directions: Notes: I use large cans (19 oz/540 ml) of yellow, green and kidney beans. Lima beans only come in a smaller can and I don't always use them. You could also add chick peas, or a can of mixed beans. Sometimes I use red pepper along with or instead of the green.

recipe.title: Black Bean Rice salad
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup minute rice brand rice, uncooked 1 can (14 oz/398 ml) black beans, drained, rinsed 1 medium red pepper, cut into thin strips 1/2 cup kraft light done right peppercorn dressing 2 green onions, sliced 1/4 cup chopped cilantro 1 tsp ground cumin
recipe.directions: Cook rice as directed on pkg. Place in a large bowl Add remaining ingredients, mix lightly, cover Refrigerate 1 hour to allow flavors to blend

recipe.title: Blueberry Delight
recipe.ingredients: 6 portion instant vanilla pudding 1 large cool whip box of graham crackers blueberry pie filling
recipe.directions: Mix pudding as directed on the box ( but put 1/2 cup less milk) Mix cool whip, add to the pudding use 9x13 pan put layer of creckers on the bottom spread half pudding mix on top then put another layer of creckers, then last half of pudding, then crackers . On the top put blueberry pie filling

recipe.title: Broccoli Salad
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup mayonnaise or salad dressing 1/2 cup white sugar 2 tbs vinegar 8 cups broccoli florettes 1 can (11oz) mandarin oranges, drained 1/2 cup chopped red onion 1/2 cup raisins ( optional)
recipe.directions: In a small bowl wisk mayo, sugar and vinegar. Cover and regrigerate for at least 2 hours In a large bowl, combine broccoli, oranges, onion and raisins Add dressing and toss to coat Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour

recipe.title: Brussels Sprouts Gratin
recipe.ingredients: 4 cups brussels sprouts 1 tbsp butter or olive oil 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese 1/4 tsp pepper
recipe.directions: Halve sprouts lengthwise. Boil in salted boiling water until tender-crisp 6 to 7 min. Drain and return to pot Add butter and cook, stirring over medium heat until tender 2-3 min. place in a small gratin pan. sprinkle with cheese and pepper Bake in 450F oven until cheese is golden brown, about 12min. makes 4 to 6 servings

recipe.title: Carrot pineapple muffins
recipe.ingredients: 1/4 cup shortening, softened 1/4 cup butter softened 1 cup sugar 2 eggs 1 1/2 cups grated carrot 1/2 cup undrained crushed pineapple 2 1/2 cups flour 1 tbsp baking powder 1 tsp ground cardamom 1 cup butter milk
recipe.directions:
Cream together shortening, butter, sugar, and eggs in a large mixing bowl until light and fluffy
Stir in carrots and pineapple
In seperate bowl combine flour, baking powder and cardamom
add all at once to the creamed mixture
pour in buttermilk and mix better just until no dry spots remaining
heap batter into wellgreased or lined muffing cups bake at 375F Let muffins stand for 10 min

recipe.title: Chai
recipe.ingredients: 4 cups water 4 tea spoons loose tea 9 tea spoons of sugar 2 1/2 cups milk 2 1/2 small spoons masala
recipe.directions:
Add water, tea, and sugar to a pot and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and add milk and masala. Bring again to a boil (watch it as may boil over with milk added). Serve.
Makes approx 4 cups.

recipe.title: Chakri
recipe.ingredients: 2 lbs Rice flour ( 4 kachora) 2 medium potatoes 1 table spoon fresh ground ginger ground fresh green chilles to taste jeeru as needed 1/2 lbs butter butter milk or yogurt as needed
recipe.directions: use the dough to make chakri with charkri machine

recipe.title: Chilli Sauce
recipe.ingredients: 20 ripe tomatoes ( blanched) 6 large onions (diced small) 4 green peppers ( diced small) 3 cups of brown sugar 3 tablespoons pickiling salt 1/2 teaspoon each of cinnamon, allspice,and cloves 3 cups of white vinegar
recipe.directions: Mix all together in large canning pot...boil until thick then simmer ....put in canning jars

recipe.title: Colleen's Cheesecake
recipe.ingredients:
CRUST 1 1/4 cups all purpose flour 1/2 cup of brown sugar 1/2 cup of golden flavour crisco 1/2 cup of coconut 1/2 cup of finely chopped nuts
FILLING
2 pkg cream cheese (softened) 2/3 cups of white sugar.......... 2 eggs.. 2 tsp vanilla.. I can cherry pie filling...
recipe.directions:
Crust , , , , ...combine flour and brown sugar.. cut in crisco until fine crumbles form,,, Add coconut and nuts mix well.............. Grease a 13-9 inch pan. TAKE A 1/2 CUP OF ABOVE CRUMBS AND SET ASIDE FOR LATER... Press remaining on bottom of greased pan.. Bake for 12 minutes at 350..............
Beat the cheese, sugar, eggs and vanilla until smooth Spread evenly over hot baked crust .. Return to oven and bake 15 minutes longer............. Spread cherry filling carefully over cheese . Then sprinkle remaining saved crumbs over top.. Return to oven and bake 15 minutes longer.... Cool then refrigerate for a few hours .. Cut into squares... ... .YOU CAN USE OTHER FILLINGS ..LIKE BLUEBERRY-RASPBERRY-STRAWBERRY-RUBARB..THEY ARE ALL GOOD..THESE ARE SO GOOD.

recipe.title: Cream Cheese Pinwheels
recipe.ingredients: 1 pkg of large flour tortillas 1 8-oz package cream cheese, softened 1 cup grated cheddar cheese 1 small can chopped olives 1 small can chopped green chilies
recipe.directions: Chopped jalapenos & Louisiana hot sauce (optional) Mix well and spread lightly on tortilla. Roll up tightly and refrigerate for at least one hour. Take out and cut into 1-inch pinwheels.

recipe.title: Date Squares
recipe.ingredients:
ROLLED OATS MIXTURE
3 cups of rolled oats 1 1/2 cups soft butter or margarine 2 cups brown sugar (packed) 2 teaspoons of baking soda pinch of salt 3 cups of flour
FILLING
4 cups of dates 2 cups of hot water 2 tablespoons of lemon juice
recipe.directions:
9 by 13 inch pan - Greased
Filling - Cook until soft
Then Mix the rolled oats mixture until crumbly. Place half the rolled oats mixture on the bottom and press down. Then put the dates over. Sprinkle a little sugar over dates. Then press down the remainder of the rolled oats mixture.
Bake at 300 for 40 minutes Cut into squares

recipe.title: Deviled Eggs
recipe.ingredients: 6 hard boiled Eggs (large) 3 tablespoons mayonnaise or salad dressing 1 tablespoon sugar 1 teaspoon mustard (honey mustard is great!) 1 teaspoon vinegar salt & pepper to taste paprika (optional)
recipe.directions:
To boil eggs, place eggs in enough cold water to cover completely, bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
Reduce heat to a lower MEDIUM BOIL and cook an additional 12 minutes. Promptly chill eggs so yolks stay bright yellow.
Remove shells from eggs, and halve lengthwise with a knife.
Carefully remove the yolks, and place in a medium bowl.
Mash yolks with a fork, and add remaining ingredients.
Very carefully spoon mixture back into the egg white halves. Garnish with a light sprinkling of paprika (optional).

recipe.title: Easy autumn pear cake
recipe.ingredients: 1 egg 1/2 cup sour cream 125 g(1/2 of 250g.pkg) Philadelphia cream cheese, softened 1 pkg. (2-layer size) yellow cake mix 7 tbsp. butter, melted, divided 1 can (14 fl.oz./398 ml)pear halves,drained, sliced into 1/2-in.slices 1pkg. (85g) jell-o lemon jelly powder 1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon 1/2 cup chopped walnuts
recipe.directions:
Preheat oven to 350 F. In a large bowl Beat egg, sour cream, cream cheese, add cake mix with electric mixer on low speed just until cake mix is moistened, scraping side of bowl often. Blend in 4tbsp of butter.Beat on medium speed 2 min.(batter will be thick)
Spread batter into lightly greased 13x9 inch baking pan. Arrange pear slices evenly on batter, pressing lightly into batter. Sprinkle evenly with dry jelly powder mix and cinnamon. Drizzle evenly with remaining 3 tbsp of butter, sprinkle with walnuts.
Bake 35 to 40 min. until toothpick inserted in cnetre comes out clean. Serve warm or at room temperature. cut into 24 pieces. cover and refrigerate teh leftover cake.

recipe.title: Fresh green bean pasta salad
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup primo penne pasta. uncooked 1/2 lb. green beans. cut into bite sized pieces 1 tomato chopped 1/4 cup kraft zesty italian dressing 1/4 cup kraft parmesan grated cheese
recipe.directions:
Cook past as directed on the package, adding beans to the cooking water for the last 2 min. of the pasta cooking time. Drain, rinse with cold water. Place in serving bowl
Add remaining ingredients. mix lightly to coat Serve immidiatley or cover and refrigerate until ready to serve

recipe.title: Fruit punch
recipe.ingredients: 2 cans of frozen orange juice 2 cans lemonade 6 cups pineapple juice 4 cups cranberry juice 3 gingerale (26 oz. bottles) 2 cans water ice
recipe.directions: Add gingerale when ready to serve

recipe.title: Gingered carrot and butternut squash soup
recipe.ingredients: 2 tbsp butter 4 carrots diced 2 cloves garlic 1 onion chopped 1 tbsp minced gingerroot 4 cups peeled, cubed butternut squash 5 cups vegetable broth 1 1/2 cup real whipping cream, divided 2 tbsp freshly squeezed lemon juice salt and pepper to taste
recipe.directions: In a large pot, melt butter over medium heat Add carrots, garlic, onion, gingerroot. Cook, stirring for about 10 min. or until soft Add stock and squash. Bring to simmer until vegetables are soft about 15 min. In a blender or food processor in batches or with immerson blender. puree until smooth stir in 1 1/4 cup of cream and season to taste with salt and pepper.

recipe.title: Golden squash soup
recipe.ingredients: 1 medium sized butternut squash, peeled and cut into about ½ inch pieces (about 3 cups) 1 large onion, chopped 3 medium cloves garlic, chopped 1 TBS chopped fresh ginger 1 tsp tumeric 1 tsp curry powder 2 3/4 cups + 1 TBS chicken or vegetable broth 6 oz canned coconut milk 2 TBS chopped fresh cilantro salt & white pepper to taste
recipe.directions:
Peel squash and cut into pieces.
Heat 1 TBS broth in medium soup pot. Healthy Sauté onion in broth over medium heat for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until translucent. Add garlic, ginger, and continue to sauté for another minute. Add turmeric, curry powder, and mix well. Add squash and broth, and mix. Bring to a boil on high heat. Once it comes to a boil reduce heat to medium low and simmer uncovered until squash is tender, about 10 minutes.
Place in blender and blend with coconut milk. Make sure you blend in batches filling blender only half full. Start on low speed, so hot soup does not erupt and burn you. Blend until smooth, about 1 minute. Thin with a little broth if needed. Season to taste with salt and white pepper. Reheat, and add cilantro.
Serves 4-6

recipe.title: Guacamole
recipe.ingredients: 4 small very ripe avocados 1 medium tomato, seeded and chopped 1 small jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped fine 3 tablespoons chopped white onion 3 tablespoons chopped red onion 3 tbsp lime juice 2 tbsp chopped fresh cilantro 2 garlic cloves chopped fine 1/2 tsp chilli powder 1/2 tsp salt
recipe.directions: Pinch freshly ground black pepperpeel, pit and chop avocados into chunks In a bowl, combine all ingredients. taste and adjust seasoning

recipe.title: Gulab jamun
recipe.ingredients:
1 Cup Aunt jamima mix 3 cups carnation powder 3 level tea spoons baking powder make the dough with milk
syrup 2 cups sugar 1 cup water boil till needes consistency(sticky)
recipe.directions: Make small balls and fry Dip them in syrup

recipe.title: Hummus
recipe.ingredients: 400g/14oz. can chickpeas 2 cloves of garlic, crushed 3 tbsp light tahini (sesame paste) 150 ml olive oil 3 tbsp lemon juice 2 tbsp. natural greek yogurt salt and pepper
recipe.directions: Drain and rinse the canned chickpeas. Place them in a food processor with garlic, tahini,olive oil and lemon juice and blend until smooth. Stir in the natural greek yogurt and season to taste. Chill slightly before serving with warmed pittas or tortolla chips. Sprinkle red chilli powder and parsley for decoration Store in the fridge for upto a week.

recipe.title: Kali khichi
recipe.ingredients: 1 bowl khichi flour 2 bowls water 1 tsp kharo 1 tsp salt ( to taste) chilli powder ground jeera powder hing
recipe.directions: boil water for 5 min add kharo and salt to water mix everything together: flour, jeera powder, chilli and hing after the water has boiled add flour mixture mix it properly together

recipe.title: katlana ladwa(after the baby is born)
recipe.ingredients:
gund - fry and press with a steel bowl
1 can of wheat flour ( chapati flour) Katlu khaskhas almonds elchi dry ginger powder ( sunth) nutmeg ( Jayfal) coconut shredded gaur
recipe.directions:
sautee flour in ghee till its golden brown
add all the spices and ghee as needed to roll into ladwa

recipe.title: Khoya choco roll
recipe.ingredients: 1 lb. grated khoya 1/4 cup ground sugar cocoa powder 2 tablespoons pistachios 2 drops rose essence(optional)
recipe.directions:
combine khoya and ground sugar in a heavy bottomed pan and cook on a slow flame While stirring continuously till the sugar has dissolved and the moisture has evaporated
cool completely till it hardens, add the rose essence
Divid into two protions
In one portion add cocoa powder as desired and mix well Roll into a 6 by 3 rectangle,keep aside
In the other portion add chopped pistachios and mix well. make a roll of 1" diameter
Place the pistachio roll on the chocolate rectangle and roll in such a way that the chocolate rectangle covers the pistachio roll evenly from all sides and there are no crecks on the surface
Wrap the roll in a waxed paper and refrigerate till firm (2 hours)
Cut into . slices and enjoy

recipe.title: Ladwa ( churmana)
recipe.ingredients:
1 1/2 can wheat flour (chapati flour) 1/2 can gram flour (channa flour) 1 can sooji (semolina) oil as needed
gaur Khaskhas cardemom (elchi)
recipe.directions: add oil and make muthia with warm water fry them in oil till golden brown cool them for few min, break and put a few at a time in the blender to make into coarse mixture. add elchi warm ghee and add gaur till it melts and forms into thick syrup add into the mixture and roll them into ladwa

recipe.title: Lime Punch (Dolly)
recipe.ingredients: 2 cans minute maid limeade (frozen) 2 containers lime sherbet (frozen) 2 (2L) lime pop or 7 up 1 Lemonlime 1 club soda
recipe.directions:
Mix everything except sherbet
add sherbet when ready to serve

recipe.title: Naan
recipe.ingredients:
Measurement - 1 litre yogurt container
1 - wheat flour( Roti) 1 - plain flour 1 packet yeast salt to taste 1 cup carnation milk powder 3/4 cup oil
recipe.directions: Make the dough as pizza cook one side on lodhi and uncooked side in the over at 500F

recipe.title: Nankhatai (indian cookies)
recipe.ingredients: 8 ozs. butter 1 cup sugar 4 eggs 1 cup sooji (semolina) 1 tsp. vanilla essence 1 tsp. baking powder 3 cups all purpose flour
recipe.directions:
Cream butter and sugar add eggs add essence add flour and bking powder and soda
Make into dough Roll in your palm inot small balls flatten a little and bake at 350 till golden brown

recipe.title: Pasta Salad
recipe.ingredients:
2 cups PRIMO Rotini Pasta, uncooked
2 cups fresh broccoli florets
1 cup halved cherry tomatoes
1/4 cup sliced PRIMO Pitted Black Olives
1/3 cup KRAFT CALORIE-WISE Italian Dressing
1/4 cup KRAFT 100% Light Grated Parmesan Cheese
recipe.directions:
COOK pasta as directed on pkg., adding broccoli to the pasta cooking water for the last 2 min. of the pasta cooking time; drain. Place in medium bowl.
ADD remaining ingredients; mix lightly. Cover.
REFRIGERATE several hours or until chilled.

recipe.title: Pickled Jalapeño Pepper Slices
recipe.ingredients: 1 lb. Jalapeño Peppers 3 tbsp. Salt 1/2 cup White Vinegar 1/2 cup Water
recipe.directions:
Thoroughly wash the Jalapeño Peppers and slice into rings about 1/8" or less in thickness (leave the seeds in, but throw away the stems).
Heat in the microwave for 5 minutes. Place the heated Jalapeño Pepper slices, Salt, Vinegar, and Water in a jar with a tight seal.
Place the lid on the jar and rotate until all the salt is dissolved. If the Peppers are not completely covered with the liquid, add additional Salt, Vinegar and Water mixture in the proportions listed above. The Jalapeño Pepper slices can be stored in the refrigerator for about two months. They are great on sandwiches and pizzas

recipe.title: Pin wheels - peter
recipe.ingredients: 1 bag spinach 1 cup finely grated carrot 1 pack cream cheese 1/3 cup ranch dressing Hot peppers to taste
recipe.directions: Mix all ingredients in bowl Let sit for an hour or so. Spread on tortillas roll and refrigerate Slice on angle

recipe.title: Potato salad
recipe.ingredients: 3/4 cup MIRACLE WHIP CALORIE-WISE Dressing 1 tsp. prepared mustard 1/2 tsp. celery seed 1/2 tsp. salt pepper, to taste 4 cups chopped cooked potatoes 2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped 1 medium onion, finely chopped 2 celery stalks, sliced 1/2 cup chopped sweet pickles
recipe.directions:
MIX dressing, mustard, celery seed, salt and pepper in large bowl until well blended.
ADD remaining ingredients; mix lightly. Cover.
REFRIGERATE until ready to serve.

recipe.title: Punch (Sushilaben kotecha)
recipe.ingredients: 1- 12 1/2 oz. frozen orange juice 1 -12 1/2 oz. frozen limeade 1- 12 1/2 oz. frozen lemonade 1 1/2 can of water 2 bottles of gingerale (26oz.each) frozen strawberries
recipe.directions: Add gingerale when ready to serve

recipe.title: Ricotta Cheese Burfi
recipe.ingredients: 16 oz. Ricotta cheese 20 oz. ton of crushed pineapple ( make sure to take off the juice) 2 cups milk powder 1-2 cup almond powder 3/4 cup sugar
recipe.directions: On medium heat, put ricotta cheese in heavy pan on stove, Stir Once the water (from the cheese) has evaporated add strained pineapple and sugar. Keep stirring When the water has evaporated again, add almond powder and milk powder. Mix well until the mixture comes together. Then empty into greased thali or cake pan. Once it is cool, cut into pieces and enjoy!!

recipe.title: Spinach dip - pumpernickle bread
recipe.ingredients: 1/2 pkg. spinach or 1 pkg, frozen , chopped, thawed(squeeze out excess water) 1 round pumpernickle bread 1 cup sour cream1 cup mayonnaise 1 medium red onion, chopped 1 stalk celery, chopped 1 carrot, shredded 1 pkg. knorr vegetable soup mix
recipe.directions:
Mix all ingredients thoroughly. Store in fridge overnight
Cut centre of loaf. fill centre with dip. cut up bread from centre into bite size pieces. place loaf on large tray and arrange cut pieces of bread around it
Can be served with crackers or raw veggies as well

recipe.title: Spinach Pesto Sauce
recipe.ingredients: 4 cups washed, torn spinach leaves, stems removed, well packed, 16 to 24 ounces 3 garlic cloves, halved 3 tablespoons walnuts 1/2 teaspoon dried leaf basil, crumbled 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil 1 med onion 1/3 cup grated parmesan cheese 1/8 tsp salt Hot cooked spaghetti
recipe.directions:
Place a few spinach leaves, garlic, walnuts, basil and a little oil in food processor. Cover and puree until leaves begin to look crushed. continue adding spinach leaves a few at a time with small amounts of oil to blender using a rubber spatula to help to combine pureed mixture. Add parmesan cheese and 1/8 salt. Cover and process until spinach pesto mixture is smooth.
Meanwhile cook pasta according to package directions, drain in colander, serve with spinach sauce

recipe.title: Tea Masala
recipe.ingredients: !/4 lb. Cinnammon sticks 3/4 lb Ginger powder 3/4 lb. Black pepper 1 lb. cloves 2 Nutmegs 1/4 lb cardimmom
recipe.directions:
Mix all the ingredients in a big basin, leave it out in sun for a few hours, and if no sun heat in microwave for a min a little by little
Grind in coffee grinder a little at a time.

recipe.title: Tomato-Basil Soup
recipe.ingredients: 1 onion 3 cloves garlic, minced 1 teaspoon olive oil 1 can (28 oz.) Roma tomatoes, undrained and cut up 1 cup water 1/4 cup snipped fresh basil leaves 1 vegetable cube (bouillon) 1/2 teaspoon sugar 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground pepper 1 teaspoon Tobasco sauce 4 fresh Roma tomatoes, chopped (2 cups), divided 1 cup skim milk, divided
recipe.directions:
Combine onion, garlic and oil in 2-quart saucepan. Cook over medium heat for 3 to 3 1/2 minutes, or until tender, stirring frequently. Add canned tomatoes, water, basil, bouillon, sugar, pepper and Tobasco sauce. Cook for 5 1/2 to 8 minutes, or until mixture is hot and flavors are blended, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat.
Combine half of tomato mixture, 2 Roma tomatoes and 1/2 cup milk in food processor or blender. Process until smooth. Set purée aside. Repeat with remaining ingredients. Return puree to saucepan. Cook over medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes, or until soup is hot, stirring occasionally.
Spoon into serving dishes. Top each serving with crostini, if desired. To make crostini, arrange 6 slices of toasted Italian bread on baking sheet. Brush slices evenly with 1 tablespoon olive oil. Top each with 2 thin slices fresh Roma tomato, 1 small fresh basil leaf and 1 tablespoon shredded fresh Parmesan cheese. Broil 5 inches from heat for 4 to 5 minutes, or until golden brown.
http://dinnercoop.cs.cmu.edu/dinnercoop/Recipes/karen/TomatoBasilSoup.html

recipe.title: Pumpkin soup
recipe.ingredients:
Curried Pumpkin Soup Recipe
2 cloves garlic, peeled 1 med onion, peeled and quartered 1 lg. jalapeno pepper, seeded and -coarsely chopped 2 Stalks celery, cut into -2-inch lengths 3 lg. Carrots, peeled and sliced -1/4 inch thick 2 tbsp. Olive oil 1 3/4 lb. pumpkin, peeled, -seeded, and cut -into 1-inch dice 1 Bay leaf 2 tsp. curry powder 1 tsp. Turmeric pinch of cayenne pepper 1 1/2 tsp. salt freshly ground pepper 2 tbsp. chopped flat-leaf parsley 1 tbsp. sour cream (optional)
recipe.directions:
Place garlic in a food processor and pulse until finely chopped. Add onion and pulse until finely chopped. Set aside. Place jalapeno in food processor and pulse until finely chopped. Add celery and pulse until finely chopped. Set aside. Place carrots in food processor and pulse until finely chopped.
Heat 1 tbsp. of the olive oil in a medium stockpot over medium heat. Add the garlic and onion and sauté, stirring occasionally, until onion is translucent, about 6 minutes. Add jalapeno, celery, and carrots and sauté for 5 minutes. Add the pumpkin, bay leaf, curry, turmeric, cayenne, 1 tsp. of the salt, and pepper to taste, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 8 minutes.
Place 2 cups of the cooked vegetables and about 1/2 cups of the liquid in the bowl of a food processor and puree until smooth. Stir puree back into the soup. Adjust seasonings, and stir in the sour cream, if desired. Garnish with roasted pumpkin seeds.
